name: cleaning_startExclude
description: This function is used to initiate cleaning with a robot vacuum cleaner, excluding specified areas.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to start cleaning.

parameters.name: rvcLocations
parameters.description: The list of locations to exclude from cleaning.
